sentences.en: "Let's get it over and done with," he ranted.
sentences.cn: “让我们就此了结这件事情，”他咆哮道。

sentences.en: As the boss began to rant, I stood up and went out.
sentences.cn: 老板开始咆哮的时候，我起身走了出去。

sentences.en: But to Fisher, Bryant's rant was never solely about bringing in top talent.
sentences.cn: 但在Fisher看来, Kobe的炮轰从来不只是想引进全明星级别的球员.

sentences.en: Even their three dogs got bored and fell asleep as he ranted on.
sentences.cn: 甚至他们的3条狗在他不停地夸夸其谈时，都觉得厌烦并睡着了。

sentences.en: His bilious temperament was apparent to all who heard him rant about his difficulties.
sentences.cn: 显然,凡听到过他对困难大声吵嚷的人,都知道他脾气暴躁.

sentences.en: I don't rant and rave or throw tea cups.
sentences.cn: 我不会大喊大叫或摔茶杯。

sentences.en: If we rant on the net, the world is our audience.
sentences.cn: 而如果我们在网络上大声嚷嚷, 全世界都是我们的听众.

sentences.en: Now many people are still rather igno - rant of immunity.
sentences.cn: 现在许多人仍然对免疫相当无知.

sentences.en: Part I is a rant against organized religion.
sentences.cn: 第一部分是对有组织的宗教的怒斥。

sentences.en: So Phillip Tattaglia would rant on to audiences unsympathetic and contemptuous.
sentences.cn: 因此,斐力普-塔塔格里亚对部下说话总是大吼大叫、不通人情、趾高气扬.

sentences.en: So there goes my emo rant about shadow priests.
sentences.cn: 这就是我关于暗牧的感情化的夸夸其谈.

sentences.en: Sometimes I couldn't control my temper I'd rant and rave so, I didn't recognize myself.
sentences.cn: 我暴躁,我胡说, 我 已经 不是我自己了.

sentences.en: The actor rant the scene on the stage.
sentences.cn: 那名演员在台上瞎叫乱喊地演那一场戏.

sentences.en: To Fisher, Bryant's rant had a deeper meaning.
sentences.cn: 对Fisher而言, 科比的炮轰有更深层的含义.

sentences.en: What he said was just rant. Don't take It'seriously.
sentences.cn: 他所说的是夸夸其谈, 不要当真.

sentences.en: Why don’t you stop ranting and raving for a minute and listen?
sentences.cn: 你别大喊大叫的，稍停一会儿，仔细听好吗？

sentences.en: You can learn a great deal more if you listen rather than rant and rave.
sentences.cn: 若能试着聆听而不是大叫大嚷的话,你就能学到更多.

sentences.en: You can rant and rave at the fine, but you'll still have to pay it.
sentences.cn: 你闹也好, 骂也好,罚金还是得交.

sentences.en: You just brought me out here to rant because faith annoys you?
sentences.cn: 你把我叫出来就是因为他的信仰使你很烦?

words.tran_cn: 大叫大嚷的人；发豪言壮语的人

phrases.tran_cn: 大叫大嚷；怒气冲冲地抱怨

trans.tran_en: to talk or complain in a loud excited and rather confused way because you feel strongly about something

trans.tran_cn: 咆哮，粗野的下结论，大声责骂
